definition: being two identical, a duplicate copy, give birth to twins
details:
adjective
- being two identical
= synonyms: matching
noun
- a duplicate copy
= synonyms: counterpart
- either of two offspring born at the same time from the same pregnancy
verb
- give birth to twins
- grow as twins
= example: grow as twins
- bring two objects, ideas, or people together
= synonyms: mate
- duplicate or match
= example: duplicate or match
= synonyms: duplicate
